title: Pokemon the Movie XY&Z: Volcanion to Karakuri no Magiana
original_name: ポケモン・ザ・ムービー XY&Z ボルケニオンと機巧のマギアナ
sinopse: The Mythical Pokemon Volcanion suddenly appears in front of Satoshi and Pikachu in the Azoth Kingdom. Volcanion calls out for Magearna, saying that it's come there to rescue it. Just who is this "Magearna" that Volcanion seems so eager to help!?
